Name: Forest Particle Lv.1
Description: Alchemy material used to craft Forest Serum and Forest Drop.
Description$english: Alchemy material used to craft Forest Serum and Forest Drop.
Description2$english: A crystal particle of the Forest, with vibrant green dancing within the crystal, pulsating with life even without touch.

recipes.Name: Forest Particle Lv.1
recipes.Des: Alchemy material used to craft Forest Serum and Forest Drop. Obtained from Artisanry​.
recipes.Des$english: Alchemy material used to craft Forest Serum and Forest Drop. Obtained from Artisanry​.

NeedMaterial.Name: Forest Crystal Shard Lv.1
NeedMaterial.Description: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A crystal rich in Engram. Easy to collect and process. Due to absorbing Engram from the atmosphere and underground during crystallization, its specific composition and shape vary by region.
